Package carefuel.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseHandler
    This class manages the database containing all information about gas stations and prices and offers functionality to request and update data.
    Main
    Main is the entry class of the application.
    PredictionUpdater
    This class can be used to update the price prediction entries of the local PSQL database.
    PredictionWorkerThread  
    PricePredictor
    The PricePredictor class enables the user to predict the prices of a gas station up to one month in the future.
    RequestController
    Dummy class for handling requests.
    StandardOutputStream  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Fuel
